name: Waifu vs Zombies
description:
Prepare for an epic battle in a world devastated by a mysterious disaster. You take on the role of a fearless and stylish college student armed to the teeth, ready to face wave after wave of relentless zombies. Complete the missions by destroying waves of zombies, unlock more poferfull weapon and new spicy content.

Waifu vs Zombies - is a third-person shooter where you play as a college student who must fitht zombies in order to survive in a post-apocalyptic city. The only thing she has left is a few bullets and memories of a bright past.

Key Features:
Fierce third-person combat with numerous zombie waves
Unlock spicy content in game gallery
Confront powerfull zombie bosses that will push your combat skills to the limit
Traverse a hauntingly beautiful post-apocalyptic cityscape
Use the environment to your advantage, run run and run
